sentences.sContent: A teenage mother was accused of smothering her 3-month-old daughter.
sentences.sCn: 一个少女妈妈被指控闷死自己三个月大的女儿。

synos.tran: 使窒息；抑制；（用灰等）闷熄；忍住
窒息状态；令人窒息的浓烟

remMethod.val: s(看作she， 她) + mother(母亲) → 母亲的溺爱快让她窒息了 → (使)窒息

trans.tranCn: 厚厚地覆盖； 窒息； 把闷熄
trans.tranOther: to completely cover the whole surface of something with something else, often in a way that seems unnecessary or unpleasant
